document_data.name: Malek Parhek
document_data.mainbody: Prince '''Malek Parhek''' "the Coinmage" was a misfortunate [[Amn]]ian son of the [[Parhek]] dynasty.
document_data.Relationships: Malek was the youngest son of King [[Dhanar Parhek]], and the younger brother of the twins Prince [[Dhanar Parhek (prince)|Dhanar the Younger]] and Princess [[Rasa Parhek|Rasa]]. He married twice, having twin children by his first wife, [[Rhinn Parhek|Rhinn]] and [[Savra Parhek|Savra]], though she died in childbirth. He remarried and had a third child, [[Parav Parhek|Parav]].
document_data.History: Malek was sent to [[Waterdeep]] as a child to keep him safe while Amn fell to civil war. He trained as a [[mage]] under Lady [[Shilarn Silmaeril]], became a caster for hire, and built a family, but in the {{YearlinkName|1305}} he was found by his brainwashed nephew [[Rohav Steelsar|Rohav]] and was killed along with his children.
